column5: I know of a few who were out perchn today and even crossed a pressure crack with a plank to get at them. Well, when they came back to cross that plank, it was floating and so were they. Farther and farther each minute, out and away from shore. It so happens that Slyatv was out on a sales call selling a wilcraft of course. Luck for them they all got a ride back to safe ice courtesy of Shane. Nice job Sly and good for you helping out as usual.
Sly to the rescue eh..  I know he never would, but he should charge them for the ride.
One of the nicest young men I have ever met! I'll never forget the day he helped Beans and I and would take nothing in return. The mold got broken after he was made!
Good on him  wilcraft to the rescue
Man, there are a lot of stupid people out there.

Truthfully. They all would have gone home with out the ride. Just all wet and cold from their little swim is all. I would have had a great laugh knowing most of them and knowing each went swimming for some Perch...  .  Ice is unsafe at all times of the year. I'm pretty sure there's some out there right now. In a Wilcraft....
And most of them ice fish on Simcoe!!
there are still guys ice fishing??? LOL.
I called it quits on Simcoe 3 weeks ago, if not more.  After that warm spell, no thanks..
Your one of the smart ones Bill!!
Now ya gone an done it.His head is going to swell.  Met Sly way back.Have met him a few times after that.Always came accross like a great guy.  Sly,hats off to you.
